des:
“Alexa, turn on living room lights.” Add Amazon Echo to your ClareHome system to experience true voice-activation of your smart home devices! ClareHome + Alexa supports full control of connected lighting, thermostats, locks, and smart home Scenes. Audio devices, entertainment, and more can be controlled via Alexa when included in a smart home Scene. Scenes may be created from the ClareHome App or additional custom Scenes may be setup by an authorized Clare Controls dealer.

To get started, simply add the ClareHome skill in the Alexa App. Next, tap Discover, and Alexa will automatically find all of your smart home devices and Scenes. It’s that easy! You can now tell Alexa to control devices in your home. Try it out using some examples below:
“Alexa, set thermostat to 72 degrees”
“Alexa, turn on Good Morning”
“Alexa, lock the front door”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50 percent”
“Alexa, turn on Welcome Home”

*Please Note – Voice control is accessible for ClareHome consumers only.

New to ClareHome? Follow the below instructions to get started.
- Download the ClareHome App for iOS or Android
- Sign-up using Google, Facebook, or a valid email address
- Select your ClareHome location
- Add and configure smart home devices
If you do not yet have a Clare smart home controller, visit www.clarecontrols.com to learn more.

To learn more about how to use Alexa with ClareHome, renaming devices to work with Alexa, and a list of supported commands, visit www.clarecontrols.com.
